title: Smart Data models - PerfReq schema
description: The performance requirements for the NSI in terms of the scenarios defined in the 3GPP TS 22.261, such as experienced data rate, area traffic capacity (density) information of UE density.

activityFactor.description: Property. Percentage value of the amount of simultaneous active UEs to the total number of UEs where active means the UEs are exchanging data with the network.. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

areaTrafficCapDL.description: Property. Area traffic capacity over downlink. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

areaTrafficCapUL.description: Property. Area traffic capacity over uplink. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

cSReliabilityMeanTime.description: Property. Mean time between failures. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

expDataRate.description: Property. User experienced data rate. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

expDataRateDL.description: Property. User experienced data rate over downlink. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

expDataRateUL.description: Property. User experienced data rate over uplink. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

survivalTime.description: Property. The time that an application consuming a communication service may continue without an anticipated message. Model:'https://schema.org/String'

transferIntervalTarget.description: Property. Time difference between two consecutive transfers of application data from an application via the service interface to 3GPP system. Model:'https://schema.org/String'
